content.rendered: This is the final installment of the High School Puzzle Hunt. This puzzle was actually made by a friend of mine, who had the original idea of making a series of puzzles based off of our school. Selenium is a website that allows Payton students to sign up for Enrichments, a 50 minute block at the end of every day that is dedicated to clubs, activities, tutoring, or anything a teacher is willing to sponsor. The answer to this puzzle is related to Payton in some way, so it could be difficult for someone who does not attend Payton to figure out. Regardless, give it a shot and let me know through email (jorge@jorgezhang.com) or leave a comment on what you think!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Gradebook Puzzle
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! This puzzle is the first in a series of puzzles that are all themed off of my high school, Walter Payton College Prep. The idea would be to place the puzzles in the school for people to solve in a puzzle hunt. Currently, I am looking for feedback…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Puzzles
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This page is where you can find cool puzzles to solve! High School Puzzle Hunt: "A Pattern Yowl"  (these are instructions, not a puzzle) Gradebook Puzzle Mood Meter Puzzle Compass Puzzle Seminar Puzzle Selenium Puzzle

jetpack-related-posts.title: Compass Puzzle
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This puzzle is based off of the 4 C's, one of the slogans our school has. The 4 C's are Character, Courage, Compassion, and Curiosity. They make up "Compass," which is essentially what you are supposed to use to guide your life. This puzzle is part of a puzzle series…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mood Meter Puzzle
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This puzzle is based off of something called the Mood Meter at my high school, and is part of a puzzle series that I am making. The idea would be to eventually place the puzzles around the school for people to solve. Currently, I am looking for feedback on the puzzles,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seminar Puzzle
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This puzzle is based off of seminars, which are special days where students can sign up for classes that are not part of the traditional curriculum. I've attached a sample of the seminar listings to this page so that you can compare. You may need to consult it to find…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome! On this website, you can find a blog detailing my process in designing and developing Daggers High. You can also find a bunch of cool puzzles on the puzzles tab! Daggers High is a board game where each player plays as a student trying to get into college. Playtesting…
